body_html:
I think this is an issue caused by incomplete download.
When I run

./scripts/build_anaconda.sh --install-locally --cuda 9.0 --cudnn 7

When downloading some necessary packages, I enter 'ctrl+c'.
However, when I run the above command again, I met the same problem.
I try to reboot to flash my cache, but I met the same problem.

body:
I think this is an issue caused by incomplete download. 
When I run 
```bash
./scripts/build_anaconda.sh --install-locally --cuda 9.0 --cudnn 7
```
When downloading some necessary packages, I enter 'ctrl+c'.
However, when I run the above command again, I met the same problem. 
I try to reboot to flash my cache, but I met the same problem.
